00022 class Condition {
00023     public:
00024         Condition();
00025         virtual ~Condition();
00026 
00028         virtual BOOLEAN IsTrue() const = 0;
00029 };

00034 class BooleanCondition : public Condition {
00035     typedef Condition Base;
00036 
00037     public:
00039         BooleanCondition();
00040 
00042         virtual ~BooleanCondition();
00043

00046 
00049         void SetTrue();

00053

00055         BOOLEAN m_is_true;

00062 class TimeoutCondition : public BooleanCondition {
00063     typedef BooleanCondition Base;
00064 
00065     public:
00067         TimeoutCondition();
00069         TimeoutCondition(UINT32 timeout);
00070 
00072         virtual ~TimeoutCondition();
00073 
00075         void Init(UINT32 timeout);
00076 
00078         BOOLEAN IsTimerExpired() const { return m_timer_expired; }
00079 
00080     private:
00081         friend class TriggerTimer<TimeoutCondition>;
00082 
00083         BOOLEAN m_timer_expired;
00084         TriggerTimer<TimeoutCondition> m_timer;

00086         virtual void OnTimer();
